no.kartverket.glrenderer

Class ArGLRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.kartverket.glrenderer.ArGLRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer

    public class ArGLRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer
    An OpenGL renderer that renders the Tango RGB camera texture on a full-screen background and two spheres representing the earth and the moon in Augmented Reality.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ArGLRenderer.RenderCallback
      A small callback to allow the caller to introduce application-specific code to be executed in the OpenGL thread.

    • Constructor Summary

      • getTextureId

        public int getTextureId()
        It returns the ID currently assigned to the texture where the Tango color camera contents should be rendered. NOTE: This must be called from the OpenGL render thread; it is not thread safe.
        Returns:
